name: Ikea GLADHÖJDEN standing desk
description:
Max. load: 10 kg
Width: 100 cm
Depth: 60 cm
Max. height: 115 cm
Min. height: 72 cm
Used desk, no scratches nor stains. This sit/stand desk doesn't need electricity, so it can be placed anywhere and without messy cables. You can easily adjust the height of the desk between 72 and 115 cm by holding and pinching the handle and then pushing the tabletop up/down until you have the desired position for standing or sitting. The gas spring and the stable steel base allow the desk to be raised/lowered quietly, quickly and safely to a comfortable height. I will cover delivery.

name: Combi Mechacal Handy 4 Cas – Ultra-Light (4.7kg) & Auto-Swivel Wheels
description:
Condition: [e.g., Good 8/10. Cleaned and ready to use.]
The gold standard for lightweight strollers in Singapore. This Combi Mechacal Handy is perfect for parents who travel solo with their baby. It is so light you can carry it up the stairs with one arm while holding your baby in the other!
Premium Features:
• Auto-4 Cas (Swivel Wheels): Smooth 360° steering even when the baby is facing you.
• Ultra-Lightweight (4.7kg): Makes taking the bus or MRT a breeze.
• High Seat (55cm): Keeps baby away from ground heat and closer to you.
• EggShock Technology: Superior vibration absorption for a smoother ride on SG pavements.
• One-Hand Fold: Collapses in a second with a single button.
• Full UV Canopy: Stylish striped/polka-dot lining with mesh windows for ventilation.
Original price was $599.

NOTE: pls pickup from bishan mrt.
